item.title: CVE-2020-14524|2024-09-17T01:55:40.883Z -- softing%20industrial%20automation%20all%20versions%20prior%20to%20the%20latest%20build%20of%20version%204.47.0 -- opc
item.description: Softing Industrial Automation all versions prior to the latest build of version 4.47.0, The affected product is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.
